short_summary: two semi-automatic  wrapping machines for the Department of National Defence
description: This is a tender for the provision of two (2) semi-automatic wrapping machines including training, documentation, delivery, maintenance service and the option to buy two (2) additional semi-automatic wrapping machines, located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada and Laval, Quebec, Canada. The department wants to buy semi-automatic wrapping machines and requires training and support services.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

### W1941: Semi-Automatic Wrapping Machine

#### Tender Notice Reference: WS4617753724-Doc4630488048

#### Amendment: 1

#### Solicitation Number: WS4617753724

#### Tender Closure Date: July 17, 2024, at 14:00:00 hours

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence, invites interested vendors to submit proposals for the acquisition of semi-automatic wrapping machines. These machines will be used for packaging purposes at various locations in Montreal and Laval, Quebec, Canada.

**Technical Specifications:**

* Two (2) semi-automatic wrapping machines, including training, documentation, delivery, and maintenance service
* Option to purchase two (2) additional semi-automatic wrapping machines

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Opportunity:** Quebec, Canada (specifically, Montreal and Laval)

**Contracting Entity:**

* Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Place du Portage, Phase III, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5)
* Country: Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Catherine Mezey (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: catherine.mezey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

To obtain more information and a copy of the Request for Proposal (RFP) document, please visit [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20066776?extsite=MjAwNjY3NzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20066776?extsite=MjAwNjY3NzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Note: This tender announcement is now closed and the tender closing date has expired.
